home.subtitle: Text-to-SQL Dashboard
home.ask_question: Ask a question to visualize data

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.subtitle: ERD visualization of DuckDB schema
catalog.enriching_progress: LLM enrichment in progress... Descriptions appear as they are generated
catalog.select_table: Click on a table to see details
catalog.not_enriched_warning: This table has not been enriched by the LLM yet. Click "Enrich" to generate descriptions.
catalog.extraction_result: {tables} tables, {columns} columns. Select tables to enrich.
catalog.select_tables_hint: Check at least one table before enriching
catalog.llm_configure_hint: Configure an API key in Settings > LLM Models
catalog.vertex_ai_schema_complex: Schema too complex for Vertex AI
catalog.reduce_batch_size: Reduce Batch Size in Settings > Database
catalog.will_be_enriched: Will be enriched on next "Enrich" click
catalog.full_stats_sent: ✓ All statistics will be sent to the LLM
catalog.compact_stats_sent: ⚠️ Only name, type, description and range will be sent

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Application configuration
settings.batch_size_help: Number of tables sent to the LLM per request during enrichment. Reduce if you get "too many states" error with Vertex AI.
settings.max_chart_rows_help: Beyond this limit, charts are disabled. The paginated table remains available.

runs.title: Runs History
runs.subtitle: Visualization of extraction and enrichment pipelines

prompts.description: Configure the prompts used by the LLM for analysis and catalog enrichment.
prompts.mode_compact_desc: Simple schema (name, type). Fewer tokens, faster responses.
prompts.mode_full_desc: Enriched schema (stats, ENUM, distribution). More accurate for complex queries.
prompts.init_help: Run sqlite3 catalog.sqlite < schema.sql to initialize prompts.
